column5: Hi all,  Managed to get on the ice for an hour and a half today. 6" of good ice.  Got a limit of walleye!   LET THE GOOD TIMES ROLL!    <iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/wPTCN3dfI8I" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>             Fish were in 19' FOW, pink jig was the hot one, jigs tipped with a good size dace minnow. Bite lasted about half an hour just before sunset.
yep, thats ice. good job man
So not fair A skim of ice on the ponds down here
Jealous. Wish I was on the ice
Green with envy! Keep the reports coming!
Nice Simon...Way to go!
Very nice. Thats the way. Seems like it's going to be late opener down south of you.
winterized the boat today now I'm ready for the ice to show up! Some nice fish you got there
I'm on my way up tomorrow Limey! lol

Now Simon I knew you'd be among the first to post eyes ice fishing report ...and you didn't mislead me  But I've noticed one problem my friend - you seem not to have a good photograph out there...should I come by and help taking photo shots for you and the eyes   ha ha ha  Cheers, Ice Fisherman
global warning my azz......is it really that time of year again ....  nice shootin Simon enjoy the feed
Simon I try...I mean I REALLY  try not to hate you this time of year...but it's so hard  Congrats on your bounty and safe ice   I sure wish it was me

Thanks for the replies folks...hopefully i'll be getting out at least once a week from now till ice out!    Before ya know it you'll be out there Dawg...its coming!     It did feel good to get out...have not wet a line for weeks now...it was killing me!      Will do amigo...i'm gonna go out to a different lake tomorrow...its about ten minutes up the road from the one in this post...its much deeper so maybe no ice and a return to where i went today.      Thanks tb4me.     Yeah...-40 celcius sucks...but it has it's advantages too.     I winterized my boat a good 2 weeks before i needed to....but i dont regret it...its a pain trying to do in the snow with a frozen hose pipe!       Seriously man...do it! Rick, if we dont get out before Xmas, give it another 5 weeks and we'll do Vickers for Lakers if ya like.      Awesome IF.....i have a feeling i would be the one taking pictures of your fish though!      Thanks man.....its been over a month since i ate fish...looking forward to lunch.   You like me really

I knew sooner or later I'd see an icy Limey report    Man I so can't wait to get walking on the hard stuff... Square tails will be the first specie targeted this season... only opens on December 20th, it's coming real soon  Thanks for sharing Simon!!! Jacques
Nice job Simon.  Good way to start off the season.
I drove by a small pond with a good 1 inch of slushy and fractured ice.... we're almost there  Getting your limit on your first attempt is amazing! Great start to the season.
Gasp! Sputter!  So jealous!!!!  Can't believe how mild it is down here....nice to see you haven't lost the touch...beauty eyes!
THIS WEATHER SUCKS...JUST VENTING
Spent Sunday fishing without a jacket on...pushing 14 degrees.  Thanks for showing us how it's done!
Nice fish. Other than that...
Okay, that's just plain mean Simon  Congrats bud, glad you can get out as early as you do

Thanks Jacques, only 2 weeks to go for some of those specks...go get 'em!    Thanks man...i was totally prepared to be happy with just finding safe ice! To get a limit to was awesome.    Not long now then RC....not long. The fish tatsed awesome...its been a month at least since my last fry up!    Soon enough JB...soon enough.    Thats what i said too....2 weeks ago the lake froze...then almost completely melted again.    I'm pretty sure it wont be long before you and JB will be doing the JAYZUZ.    Your weird Bruce....lol.    i hate me too....lol.
whohooo .. awesome ... lookin forward to more reports to fuel the fire
Wow...ice fishing already!!  Wish I liked it more than I do lol.  Great stuff....and Im looking forward to many of your reports this winter!
